pages
Class GenrePredictor

java.lang.Object
  pages.GenrePredictor
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GenrePredictorAllVsAll, GenrePredictorBagged, GenrePredictorForest, GenrePredictorLogistic, GenrePredictorMulticlass, GenrePredictorSVM
public class GenrePredictor
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The base class GenrePredictor is an uninteresting wrapper for WekaDriver. It passes everything it's given to WekaDriver and returns everything WekaDriver returns. The reason for its existence is that it can be subclassed to create more interesting patterns, notably GenrePredictorAllVsAll, which implements the same behavior in a very different way.
